name.vi: Giấy phép Công cộng Mozilla, phiên bản 1.1
name.ja: Mozilla Public License バージョン 1.1
name.zh-CN: Mozilla 公共许可协议，版本 1.1

description.en-US:
Adds a custom header called "From/To" in the message list which displays the senders of messages sent to you, or the recipients of messages sent from you. It turns out that THERE IS ALREADY AN ADD-ON THAT DOES THIS, Show InOut. That add-on is far more functional than this one, so I'm going to stop maintaining it and defer to Show InOut. If you specifically like the behavior of From/To Column with regards to putting a "to" prefix in front of the recipient for outgoing messages, you can achieve this same functionality in Show InOut by editing these preferences (not available through the preferences GUI, but available through the advanced configuration editor):
  • Set "extensions.showInOut.PrefixType" to "text".
  • Set "extensions.showInOut.InTextPrefix" and/or "extensions.showInOut.OutTextPrefix" to the prefix you want for inbound and/or outbound messages.

name.ja: 差出人/宛先 カラム

summary.el: Προσθήκη “Από/Προς” στήλη που δείχνει τον παραλήπτη, αν είναι ο αποστολέας.
summary.vi: Add a “From/To” column which shows the recipient if you are the sender.

summary.ar: إضافة "من / إلى" عمود مما يدل على المتلقي إذا كنت المرسل.
